controls.title: Game Controls
controls.onlineText: Use W/S to control your paddle
controls.localText: Use W/S for the left paddle and O/L for the right paddle
controls.altControls: Alternative controls: ↑/↓ keys or use up/down buttons on mobile
controls.importantText: If you use fullscreen mode, it is strongly recommended NOT to use the arrow keys

navMenu.title: Navigation Menu Overview
navMenu.profileText: In your profile you can personalize your experience by changing your avatar, password, nickname, email, and username. These options are only available if you did not log in with Google OAuth.
navMenu.playPongText:
• Choose random opponents for quick matches
• Leave ongoing matches if needed
• Start local matches on the same screen
• Confirm your participation in tournaments
• Enjoy smooth controls
navMenu.historyText: View a summary of all your matches, with details about opponents and whether they were tournaments or normal games.
navMenu.tournamentText: See the structure and progress of ongoing tournaments. Results are displayed in a round tree.
navMenu.tournamentMgmtText:
• Create tournaments of 2, 4, or 8 players
• Make them private or public
• Join by ID or browse available tournaments
• Each tournament shows name, players, and join buttons
navMenu.friendsText: Add players to your friends list and check their online status. Use the refresh button to update statuses.
